Class StudentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.StudentDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StudentDAOInterface
    public class StudentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements StudentDAOInterface
    StudentDAO is used for communication between Student and DB.

      • insertStudent

        public int insertStudent​(java.lang.String email,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String surname,
                         int userType,
                         char sex,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.sql.Date date)
        This method takes care of registering a new student in the system.
        Specified by:
        insertStudent in interface StudentDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        email - refers to the email inserted by the student in the system interface
        name - refers to the name entered by the student in the system interface
        surname - refers to the surname entered by the student in the system interface
        userType - refers to the userType assigned to the specific user to whom the function is dedicated
        sex - refers to sex, chosen through radio button, during recording
        password - refers to the password entered by the student in the system interface
        date - refers to the system date at the time of registration
        Returns:
        param int
